text.react: [{"type":"p","props":{"children":["Source: https://medium.com/@parsyval/javascript-prototype-vs-class-a7015d5473b"]}},{"type":"p","props":{"children":[]}},{"type":"p","props":{"children":["Object / Prototype",{"type":"br","props":{"children":null}},"- Constructor-like function",{"type":"br","props":{"children":null}},"- Use of New to add instance of the prototype=",{"type":"br","props":{"children":null}},"- Objects inherit from other objects",{"type":"br","props":{"children":null}},"- The custom one inherit from higher generic Object",{"type":"br","props":{"children":null}},"- Has __proto__ object with function",{"type":"br","props":{"children":null}},"- Created Instances are REFERENCES to the Prototype - changing the __proto__ of an object, changes the class and all objects"]}},{"type":"p","props":{"children":[]}},{"type":"p","props":{"children":["Class",{"type":"br","props":{"children":null}},"ES6 Classes are 'syntactital sugar' for Prototypes",{"type":"br","props":{"children":null}},"- Has extends, constructor, super, static classes",{"type":"br","props":{"children":null}},"- But still uses __proto__ unerneath the hood and is based on references",{"type":"br","props":{"children":null}},"- A Class is of type function"]}}]
